channel.title: Scout/vanguard class 2.0
channel.description:
The Scout
Unique blue dragon investigative
Passives:
(1) Faster than a speeding bullet-immune to most occupation and redirection abilities
Day ability 1 (Eavesdrop) learn if your target uses a day ability today (2 uses)
Night ability 1 (Watch ahead) learn what classes viset your target (infinite uses)
Night ability 2 (Stalk) learn what classes your target visits (2 uses)
The Vanguard Unseen support
Passive same as scout
Night ability 1
(Carful eye) give the assassin the benefits of the sorcerers “Perception” tonight (3 uses)
Night ability 2
(Supply and demand)
Give the assassin one more charge of nightshade and 2 for 1 (2 for 1 must have already been used) (1 use)

item.title: Scout/vanguard class 2.0
item.dc:creator: Scl007
item.description:
Also it’s similar but not the same as gossip it can see the difference of a butler or servent for example or a phys or herb

Read full topic

item.title: Scout/vanguard class 2.0
item.dc:creator: SimpleValueDeskFan
item.description:
Scl007:

Night ability 1 (Watch ahead) learn what classes viset your target (infinite uses)

This, I like this
but it does have the same effect as noble gossip
and perhaps is could have limits? Like it can’t see MM or CL for obvious reasons

Read full topic
